resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    size="0",
    aggs={
        "range": {
            "date_range": {
                "field": "date",
                "format": "MM-yyy",
                "ranges": [
                    {
                        "from": "01-2015",
                        "to": "03-2015",
                        "key": "quarter_01"
                    },
                    {
                        "from": "03-2015",
                        "to": "06-2015",
                        "key": "quarter_02"
                    }
                ],
                "keyed": True
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
